title: 2 bedroom duplex
description:
Freshly painted second floor duplex apartment, with Laminate flooring throughout. Situated in a nice neighborhood, with an easy walk to train station, and small town center. Shared basement with a hook up for your washer and dryer. There is off street parking, and a small yard in the back.

Tenant pays for gas, electric, and water which is split with downstairs. Add $30.00 for each cat. No more than two cats allowed. No dogs allowed. We take first month rent as a deposit to hold the apartment. At signing of the lease we take security deposit and last months rent. Tenant can bring in a washer and dryer and hook it up in the basement. One year lease then month to month. Application fee is $30.00

title: Beautiful One Bedroom In Haverford
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. description:

Cat friendly building, with deposit. All of the best restaurants of Fishtown are within a short walk! It's a 3 minute walk to the Girard EL Station for a green 10 minute trip to Center City or beyond....

title: PRICE DROP 1 Bed/1 Bath, Parking PRIME LOCATION+WASHER+DRYER
description:
This gut-renovated true one-bedroom apartment located on one of the most bucolic WeHo blocks, available immediately.
This corner unit has new hardwood floors throughout, an updated kitchen (black fridge, granite countertop & state of the art stainless steel stove/range), a beautiful renovated windowed tiled bathroom (new toilet & sink with a vintage tub), and tall modern windows—you'll never get tired of the light flowing into your home through the multiple [Northern & Western] exposures!
The apartment is sun-filled & well laid-out, featuring a generous bedroom with a big closet, thermostat-equipped ceiling fans to help keep your electricity bills down in the summer months, and updated electrical, plumbing & heating. This top-floor unit (only two flights up) boasts soaring (nearly) 12 foot ceilings—and no upstairs neighbors! The bedroom can easily fit a queen-sized bed and complete bedroom set. Beautiful views of Uptown Philadelphia and Philadelphia are seen through the living area window.
The building is quiet, with only four units per floor. Mere minutes to the 2/3 trains at King Plaza and the B/Q express trains at 7 Ave (only two stops before Philadelphia). While living in this apartment, you'll enjoy being steps to all the best Philadelphia has to offer: Prospect Park, the  Philadelphia Museum, the Greenmarket at King Army Plaza, the central branch of the Philadelphia Public Library, the Philadelphia Botanical Gardens, the Barclay's Center, as well as hot spots such as Olmsted, Tom's Restaurant, Chavella's, Barboncino, Ample Hills, Blue Marble, Chuko, and many many others (with new delights popping up every week!).

title: AWESOME 3BED 3BATH FOR RENT
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 1534 N Natrona St! This breathtaking 3 bedroom / 3 bathroom single family home features hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, central a/c, finished basement, a balcony, and sleek finishes throughout. Enter into the first floor living area with 2 big windows at the front and the staircase straight ahead. The straight-back floor plan is spacious and bright, and can accommodate different types of furniture set ups. Continue into your gorgeous kitchen offering 2 long rows of cabinetry above & below for ample storage space. There is tons of prep space and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including an electric stovetop, 2 ovens, built-in overhead microwave, dishwasher, and a large refrigerator making this kitchen a chef's dream! A finished basement is available for additional living space and would serve well as a den, office, or workout room. You will also find your washer & dryer in the basement, as well as a full bathroom with a modern floating vanity and a sleek glass shower stall with detachable showerhead. Continue upstairs on the second floor to view 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The primary bedroom has incredible natural sunlight and an en suite bathroom equipped with gorgeous tiling, a vanity, medicine closet, and glass shower stall. A front porch is perfect for enjoying those warmer months - call for a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Nestled in the lovely Brewerytown neighborhood of Philadelphia, just steps from the Philadelphia Zoo, Temple University, Eastern State Penitentiary, and more. Close proximity to Athletic Square Park, Boathouse Row, Lemon Hill, and Fairmount Park. Walkable to tons of public transportation options including bus routes and the trolley line. Favorite neighborhood eateries and stores include The Monkey & The Elephant, Cultivare Plant Store, Ridge Diner, Green Eggs Cafe, Holistic Jawn Food Store, and countless more! Lease Terms: Generally.

title: Close To Train, Shopping  & Dining
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: This unit has it all, nicely wrapped up in a cozy package.
description: Lots of natural light, high ceilings, oversized windows, architectural details, original natural wood floors, contemporary open floor plan--. this unit has it all, nicely wrapped up in a cozy package! The cozy residence stuns with its abundance of light flowing through the amazing windows that border the west wall, a feature that defines the space with breadth and design. The kitchen is an attractive, functional eating area with white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances granite counters and bar stools for casual seating. The living room, accented with high ceilings and lovely floors, feels surprisingly spacious, offering a comfortable seating and entertaining space. A dedicated, king-sized bedroom is accessed through the adjoining doorway, also accented with those amazing windows and a nice sized closet. A decorative column is a showcase of the original building and sits in a hallway that defines the entrance. A retro-designed bathroom with handsome black and white floor tiles, a tub/shower combo with a sliding glass door and white vanity with black granite counter sits conveniently off the entryway. Located in the historic district of Old City, 315 Arch is a well maintained, stately structure located across from the Quaker Meeting House and next to the Ben Franklin key sculpture and fountain park. Old City is a vibrant neighborhood, home to cultural and historic institutions, numerous cafes and restaurants, boutiques and design shops. It is a hub of public transportation with easy access within and out of the city. Truly an urban oasis for the ultimate urban lifestyle!

I am seeking someone to rent my house. It is a 3 room, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom house. There is a large kitchen, and open living room and entry room. The basement is unfurnished. There's a backyard.
The house is aesthetically unique. It is not a new construction, it is a very well built home from the 1910s. Most of the house is exposed- brick, concrete & ceilings.
The place is furnished with everything seen in photos. Sofas, chairs, tables, beds, shelves, TV, desks, appliances, etc. Lots of storage is still available in the basement. Some space in the basement is dedicated to storing my stuff.
The neighborhood is beautiful. One can easily walk to downtown. There's also free street parking around, it is also a convenient commute to the Hospitals of Pennsylvania. There are many cafes, restaurants, and shops nearby...and a beer distributor one block away.
This is an energy efficient home, the gas line has been disconnected, therefore all heat and appliances are powered differently. I have an AC/Heater minisplit unit downstairs that covers the 1st floor. There is also central air for the whole house. Each bedroom has wallmounted (electric) space heaters. The stove is connected to a propane tank, which with heavy  use, needs refilling about every 6-9 months. The dryer is electric. This setup is different but ultimately leads to much cheaper energy/bill costs.
Renter would pay for electric bill and internet, in addition to cost of refilling propane tank. There is no gas bill and I will handle the water bill.
Please ask questions or inquire about any details, some things are negotiable, like which furniture needs to stay or if you want to replace the beds, so on and so on. Will be seeking income verification for prospective renter(s) and a $1900 security deposit.
Text before calling
Michael
